# [Interview #970: Literate Liquors Interview with Brandon Sanderson, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=970#1)

#### Marie Curie

This is a transcript of an interview by Literate Liquors with Brandon at LibertyCon in July 2012.
